comprehensive_overview: makeinfo is a program that formats and prints Texinfo documentation. Texinfo is a typesetting syntax used for generating documentation in a variety of output formats such as HTML, DVI, PDF, PostScript, and plain text.
core_features: 1. Formatting Texinfo documentation for various output formats. 2. Generating high-quality documentation with cross-references and indices. 3. Customizable templates for styling output documents. 4. Integration with build systems for automated documentation generation.
